item.title: Dozens survive Kazakhstan passenger plane crash
item.description: Kazakh authorities say 38 people were killed in the incident in western Kazakhstan.

item.title: Bald eagle officially declared US national bird after 250 years
item.description: The bird has been a national emblem in the US for years, but it never had an official status in the country's 248-year history.

item.title: Pope urges negotiations to end Ukraine-Russia war
item.description: The pontiff also called for a ceasefire in Gaza and the freeing of hostages held by Hamas.

item.title: Zelensky condemns 'inhumane' Christmas Day attack
item.description: Russia has launched a major missile and drone attack on Ukraine's energy infrastructure.

item.title: Owner and architect of Turkey quake collapse hotel jailed
item.description: They received hefty sentences after 72 people were killed when the building fell in the 2023 quake.
